metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31609 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager (vGPU plugin), where it allows the guest VM to allocate resources for which the guest is not authorized. This vulnerability may lead to loss of data integrity and confidentiality, denial of service, or information disclosure.

notes.Note: sbeattie> affects vGPU manager only mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
